title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over

versions.title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over
versions.summary: Modelled unemployment rate for people aged 16 years and over, Great Britain, 07/2004-06/2005 to 07/2022-06/2023.
versions.description: This dataset shows modelled-based estimates for the proportion of people aged 16 years and over without a job who have been actively seeking work within the last four weeks and are available to start work within the next two weeks

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The geography code associated with the observation.

columns.name: areanm
columns.description: The name associated with the geography code.

columns.name: geography
columns.description: The categorisation of the geography code

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type of the observational value

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit associated with the measure type

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value, if needed
